System.M_CUST001: SELECT M.CUST_CODE, RTRIM(COALESCE(MC.CUST_RNAME,'')) AS CUST_RNAME, (RTRIM(COALESCE(MC.CUST1_NAME,'')) || ' ' || RTRIM(COALESCE(MC.CUST2_NAME,''))) AS CUST_NAME, M.USE_FLG, RTRIM(COALESCE(MC.CUST_KANA,'')) AS CUST_KANA FROM M_CUST AS M LEFT JOIN M_CUSTR AS MC ON M.CUST_CODE = MC.CUSTR_CODE $WHERE
System.M_CUST002: SELECT M.CUST_CODE, RTRIM(COALESCE(MC.CUST_RNAME,'')) AS CUST_RNAME, (RTRIM(COALESCE(MC.CUST1_NAME,'')) || ' ' || RTRIM(COALESCE(MC.CUST2_NAME,''))) AS CUST_NAME, M.USE_FLG, RTRIM(COALESCE(MC.CUST_KANA,'')) AS CUST_KANA FROM M_CUST AS M LEFT JOIN M_CUSTR AS MC ON M.CUST_CODE = MC.CUSTR_CODE $WHERE
System.M_CUST004: SELECT RTRIM(M.CUST_CODE) AS CUST_CODE ,RTRIM(MC.CUSTC_NAME) AS CUSTC_NAME ,RTRIM(MC.CUST_RNAME) AS CUST_RNAME ,RTRIM(MC.CUST_KANA) AS CUST_KANA ,RTRIM(M.CUSTTYP1_CODE) AS CUSTTYP1_CODE ,RTRIM(M.TELNO) AS TELNO ,RTRIM(M.OLD_CODE) AS OLD_CODE FROM M_CUST AS M INNER JOIN M_CUSTR AS MC ON M.CUST_CODE = MC.CUSTR_CODE $WHERE
System.M_CUST005: SELECT MAX(RTRIM(M.CUST_CODE)) AS CUST_CODE FROM M_CUST AS M
System.M_CUST006: SELECT COUNT(M.CUST_CODE) AS COUNT FROM M_CUST AS M
System.M_CUST007: SELECT M.CUST_CODE , M.MAILNO , M.ADRESS1 , M.ADRESS2 , M.ADRESS3 , M.TELNO , M.FAXNO , M.OUTEMPNAME , M.TTL_CODE , M.MAILADR , M.CAR_FLG , M.INDMN_FLG , M.COST1_TYPE , M.COST2_TYPE , M.COST3_TYPE , M.COST4_TYPE , M.COST5_TYPE , M.PROD_CODE , M.URLADRS , M.INOUT_FLG , M.NFORM_CODE , M.MFORM_CODE , M.OFORM_CODE , M.NFORMS_CODE , M.MFORMS_CODE , M.OFORMS_CODE , M.EMP_CODE , M.SECT_CODE , M.SECT1_CODE , M.SECT2_CODE , M.SECT3_CODE , M.SECT4_CODE , M.AREA_CODE , M.IND_CODE , M.CUSTTYP1_CODE , M.CUSTTYP2_CODE , M.CUSTTYP3_CODE , M.CUSTSP_CODE , M.CUSTTT_CODE , M.CSTORCODE , M.CCUSTCODE , M.CCLSCODE , M.CSLIPTYPE , M.UPRAUTO_FLG , M.SPR_NO , M.SPRRATE1_QTY , M.SPRRATE2_QTY , M.SPRRATE3_QTY , M.REBATE1_QTY , M.REBATE2_QTY , M.REBATE3_QTY , M.UPRFRC_TYPE , M.CLPROC_FLG , M.PKGCLM_TYPE , M.CUSTCL_CODE , M.CUSTCL1_NAME , M.CUSTCL2_NAME , M.CLMCLS_TYPE , M.SFORM_CODE , M.SFORMS_CODE , M.BLPRT_TYPE , M.SM1_DATE , M.SM2_DATE , M.SM3_DATE , M.NSM_DATE , M.ZSM_DATE , M.RECCLS1_TYPE , M.RECCLS2_TYPE , M.RECCLST_MNY , M.REC1_CODE , M.REC1_DATE , M.REC2_CODE , M.REC2_DATE , M.REC3_CODE , M.REC3_DATE , M.RECMTD_TYPE , M.PAYANT_DATE , M.BILLCNT_CODE , M.BILLCNT_DATE , M.BILLCND1_MNY , M.BILLCND1_DATE , M.BILLCND2_MNY , M.BILLCND2_DATE , M.BILLCND3_MNY , M.BILLCND3_DATE , M.BILLCND4_MNY , M.BILLCND4_DATE , M.BILLCND5_MNY , M.BILLCND5_DATE , M.SMLM_MNY , M.SMLMCND_CODE , M.SMLMCND_DATE , M.SMLMCLS_TYPE , M.ERASE_TYPE , M.TAX_TYPE , M.TAXCAL_TYPE , M.TAXFRC_TYPE , M.CRDLMT_FLG , M.CRDLMT_MNY , M.TRSBL1_MNY , M.TRSBL2_MNY , M.TRSBLN1_MNY , M.TRSBLN2_MNY , M.TRSBLM_MNY , M.LNKCODE1 , M.LNKCODE2 , M.LNKCODE3 , M.OLD_CODE , M.SEARCHIDX , M.USE_FLG , M.ADD_USER , M.ADD_PC , M.ADD_DATE , M.ADD_TIME , M.LASTUP_USER , M.LASTUP_PC , M.LASTUP_DATE , M.LASTUP_TIME FROM M_CUST AS M $WHERE
System.M_CUST008: SELECT '' AS CHK ,C.CUST_CODE ,RTRIM(COALESCE(R.CUST_RNAME,'')) AS CUST_NAME FROM M_CUST AS C LEFT JOIN M_CUSTR AS R ON C.CUST_CODE = R.CUSTR_CODE $WHERE
System.M_CUST009: INSERT INTO M_CUST( CUST_CODE , MAILNO , ADRESS1 , ADRESS2 , ADRESS3 , TELNO , FAXNO , OUTEMPNAME , TTL_CODE , MAILADR , CAR_FLG , INDMN_FLG , COST1_TYPE , COST2_TYPE , COST3_TYPE , COST4_TYPE , COST5_TYPE , PROD_CODE , URLADRS , INOUT_FLG , NFORM_CODE , MFORM_CODE , OFORM_CODE , NFORMS_CODE , MFORMS_CODE , OFORMS_CODE , EMP_CODE , SECT_CODE , SECT1_CODE , SECT2_CODE , SECT3_CODE , SECT4_CODE , AREA_CODE , IND_CODE , CUSTTYP1_CODE , CUSTTYP2_CODE , CUSTTYP3_CODE , CUSTSP_CODE , CUSTTT_CODE , CSTORCODE , CCUSTCODE , CCLSCODE , CSLIPTYPE , UPRAUTO_FLG , SPR_NO , SPRRATE1_QTY , SPRRATE2_QTY , SPRRATE3_QTY , REBATE1_QTY , REBATE2_QTY , REBATE3_QTY , UPRFRC_TYPE , CLPROC_FLG , PKGCLM_TYPE , CUSTCL_CODE , CUSTCL1_NAME , CUSTCL2_NAME , CLMCLS_TYPE , SFORM_CODE , SFORMS_CODE , BLPRT_TYPE , SM1_DATE , SM2_DATE , SM3_DATE , NSM_DATE , ZSM_DATE , RECCLS1_TYPE , RECCLS2_TYPE , RECCLST_MNY , REC1_CODE , REC1_DATE , REC2_CODE , REC2_DATE , REC3_CODE , REC3_DATE , RECMTD_TYPE , PAYANT_DATE , BILLCNT_CODE , BILLCNT_DATE , BILLCND1_MNY , BILLCND1_DATE , BILLCND2_MNY , BILLCND2_DATE , BILLCND3_MNY , BILLCND3_DATE , BILLCND4_MNY , BILLCND4_DATE , BILLCND5_MNY , BILLCND5_DATE , SMLM_MNY , SMLMCND_CODE , SMLMCND_DATE , SMLMCLS_TYPE , ERASE_TYPE , TAX_TYPE , TAXCAL_TYPE , TAXFRC_TYPE , CRDLMT_FLG , CRDLMT_MNY , TRSBL1_MNY , TRSBL2_MNY , TRSBLN1_MNY , TRSBLN2_MNY , TRSBLM_MNY , LNKCODE1 , LNKCODE2 , LNKCODE3 , OLD_CODE , SEARCHIDX , USE_FLG , ADD_USER , ADD_PC , ADD_DATE , ADD_TIME , LASTUP_USER , LASTUP_PC , LASTUP_DATE , LASTUP_TIME ) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
System.M_CUST010: UPDATE M_CUST SET MAILNO = ? , ADRESS1 = ? , ADRESS2 = ? , ADRESS3 = ? , TELNO = ? , FAXNO = ? , OUTEMPNAME = ? , TTL_CODE = ? , MAILADR = ? , CAR_FLG = ? , INDMN_FLG = ? , COST1_TYPE = ? , COST2_TYPE = ? , COST3_TYPE = ? , COST4_TYPE = ? , COST5_TYPE = ? , PROD_CODE = ? , URLADRS = ? , INOUT_FLG = ? , NFORM_CODE = ? , MFORM_CODE = ? , OFORM_CODE = ? , NFORMS_CODE = ? , MFORMS_CODE = ? , OFORMS_CODE = ? , EMP_CODE = ? , SECT_CODE = ? , SECT1_CODE = ? , SECT2_CODE = ? , SECT3_CODE = ? , SECT4_CODE = ? , AREA_CODE = ? , IND_CODE = ? , CUSTTYP1_CODE = ? , CUSTTYP2_CODE = ? , CUSTTYP3_CODE = ? , CUSTSP_CODE = ? , CUSTTT_CODE = ? , CSTORCODE = ? , CCUSTCODE = ? , CCLSCODE = ? , CSLIPTYPE = ? , UPRAUTO_FLG = ? , SPR_NO = ? , SPRRATE1_QTY = ? , SPRRATE2_QTY = ? , SPRRATE3_QTY = ? , REBATE1_QTY = ? , REBATE2_QTY = ? , REBATE3_QTY = ? , UPRFRC_TYPE = ? , CLPROC_FLG = ? , PKGCLM_TYPE = ? , CUSTCL_CODE = ? , CUSTCL1_NAME = ? , CUSTCL2_NAME = ? , CLMCLS_TYPE = ? , SFORM_CODE = ? , SFORMS_CODE = ? , BLPRT_TYPE = ? , SM1_DATE = ? , SM2_DATE = ? , SM3_DATE = ? , NSM_DATE = ? , ZSM_DATE = ? , RECCLS1_TYPE = ? , RECCLS2_TYPE = ? , RECCLST_MNY = ? , REC1_CODE = ? , REC1_DATE = ? , REC2_CODE = ? , REC2_DATE = ? , REC3_CODE = ? , REC3_DATE = ? , RECMTD_TYPE = ? , PAYANT_DATE = ? , BILLCNT_CODE = ? , BILLCNT_DATE = ? , BILLCND1_MNY = ? , BILLCND1_DATE = ? , BILLCND2_MNY = ? , BILLCND2_DATE = ? , BILLCND3_MNY = ? , BILLCND3_DATE = ? , BILLCND4_MNY = ? , BILLCND4_DATE = ? , BILLCND5_MNY = ? , BILLCND5_DATE = ? , SMLM_MNY = ? , SMLMCND_CODE = ? , SMLMCND_DATE = ? , SMLMCLS_TYPE = ? , ERASE_TYPE = ? , TAX_TYPE = ? , TAXCAL_TYPE = ? , TAXFRC_TYPE = ? , CRDLMT_FLG = ? , CRDLMT_MNY = ? , TRSBL1_MNY = ? , TRSBL2_MNY = ? , TRSBLN1_MNY = ? , TRSBLN2_MNY = ? , TRSBLM_MNY = ? , LNKCODE1 = ? , LNKCODE2 = ? , LNKCODE3 = ? , OLD_CODE = ? , SEARCHIDX = ? , USE_FLG = ? , LASTUP_USER = ? , LASTUP_PC = ? , LASTUP_DATE = ? , LASTUP_TIME = ? WHERE CUST_CODE = ?
System.M_CUST012: SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(M_CUSTR.CUST1_NAME),'') || ' ' || COALESCE(RTRIM(M_CUSTR.CUST2_NAME),'') AS CUST_NAME FROM M_CUST AS M LEFT JOIN M_CUSTR ON M.CUST_CODE = M_CUSTR.CUSTR_CODE $WHERE
System.M_CUST013: SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(M_CUSTR.CUST_RNAME),'') AS CUST_NAME FROM M_CUST AS M LEFT JOIN M_CUSTR ON M.CUST_CODE = M_CUSTR.CUSTR_CODE $WHERE
System.M_CUST014: SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(M_CUSTR.CUST1_NAME),'') || ' ' || COALESCE(RTRIM(M_CUSTR.CUST2_NAME),'') FROM M_CUST AS M LEFT JOIN M_CUSTR ON M.CUST_CODE = M_CUSTR.CUSTR_CODE $WHERE
System.M_CUST015:
SELECT CUST.CUST_CODE AS CUST_CODE, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUSTR.CUST_RNAME),'') AS CUST_NAME, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.MAILNO),'') AS MAILNO, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.ADRESS1),'') AS ADRESS1, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.ADRESS2),'') AS ADRESS2, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.ADRESS3),'') AS ADRESS3, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.TELNO),'') AS TELNO, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.FAXNO),'') AS FAXNO, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.OUTEMPNAME),'') AS OUTEMPNAME , COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.TTL_CODE),'') AS TTL_CODE, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'TTL' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.TTL_CODE ) AS TTL_NAME, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.MAILADR),'') AS MAILADR, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.CAR_FLG),'') AS CAR_FLG, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'CCAR' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.CAR_FLG ) AS CAR_FLG_NM, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.INDMN_FLG),'') AS INDMN_FLG, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'IND' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.INDMN_FLG ) AS INDMN, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.COST1_TYPE),'') AS COST1_TYPE, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'COSTTYPC' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.COST1_TYPE ) AS COST1_NM, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.COST2_TYPE),'') AS COST2_TYPE, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'COSTTYPC' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.COST2_TYPE ) AS COST2_NM, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.COST3_TYPE),'') AS COST3_TYPE, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'COSTTYPC' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.COST3_TYPE ) AS COST3_NM, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.COST4_TYPE),'') AS COST4_TYPE, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'COSTTYPC' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.COST4_TYPE ) AS COST4_NM, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.COST5_TYPE),'') AS COST5_TYPE, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'COSTTYPC' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.COST5_TYPE ) AS COST5_NM, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.PROD_CODE),'') AS PROD_CODE, COALESCE(RTRIM(PROD.PROD_NAME),'') AS PROD_NAME, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.URLADRS),'') AS URLADRS, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.INOUT_FLG),'') AS INOUT_FLG, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'INOUT' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.INOUT_FLG ) AS INOUT_FLG_NM, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.NFORM_CODE),'') AS NFORM_CODE, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'FORM_N' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.NFORM_CODE ) AS FORM_N, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.MFORM_CODE),'') AS MFORM_CODE, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'FORM_M' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.MFORM_CODE ) AS FORM_M, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.OFORM_CODE),'') AS OFORM_CODE, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'FORM_O' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.OFORM_CODE ) AS FORM_O, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.NFORMS_CODE),'') AS NFORMS_CODE, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(SENDNMNAME),'') FROM M_SENDERNM WHERE FORMNMCODE = '2' AND SENDCODE = CUST.NFORMS_CODE ) AS SFORM_N, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.MFORMS_CODE),'') AS MFORMS_CODE, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(SENDNMNAME),'') FROM M_SENDERNM WHERE FORMNMCODE = '1' AND SENDCODE = CUST.MFORMS_CODE ) AS SFORM_M, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.OFORMS_CODE),'') AS OFORMS_CODE, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(SENDNMNAME),'') FROM M_SENDERNM WHERE FORMNMCODE = '5' AND SENDCODE = CUST.OFORMS_CODE ) AS SFORM_O, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.EMP_CODE),'') AS EMP_CODE, COALESCE(RTRIM(EMP.EMP_NAME),'') AS EMP_NAME, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.SECT_CODE),'') AS SECT_CODE, COALESCE(RTRIM(SECT.SECT_NAME),'') AS SECT_NAME, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.SECT1_CODE),'') AS SECT1_CODE, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.SECT2_CODE),'') AS SECT2_CODE, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.SECT3_CODE),'') AS SECT3_CODE, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.SECT4_CODE),'') AS SECT4_CODE, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.AREA_CODE),'') AS AREA_CODE, COALESCE(RTRIM(AREA.AREA_NAME),'') AS AREA_NAME, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.IND_CODE),'') AS IND_CODE, COALESCE(RTRIM(IND.IND_NAME),'') AS IND_NAME, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.CUSTTYP1_CODE),'') AS CUSTTYP1_CODE, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUSTTYP1.CUSTTYP_NAME),'') AS CUSTTYP1_NAME, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.CUSTTYP2_CODE),'') AS CUSTTYP2_CODE, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUSTTYP2.CUSTTYP_NAME),'') AS CUSTTYP2_NAME, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.CUSTTYP3_CODE),'') AS CUSTTYP3_CODE, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUSTTYP3.CUSTTYP_NAME),'') AS CUSTTYP3_NAME, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.CUSTSP_CODE),'') AS CUSTSP_CODE, COALESCE(RTRIM(SHIP.CUST1_NAME),'') AS SHIP_NAME, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.CUSTTT_CODE),'') AS CUSTTT_CODE, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUSTTT.CUST1_NAME),'') AS CUSTTT_NAME, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.CSTORCODE),'') AS CSTORCODE, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.CCUSTCODE),'') AS CCUSTCODE, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.CCLSCODE),'') AS CCLSCODE, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.CSLIPTYPE),'') AS CSLIPTYPE, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.UPRAUTO_FLG),'') AS UPRAUTO_FLG, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'UPRAUTO' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.UPRAUTO_FLG ) AS UPRAUTO_FLG_NM, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.SPR_NO),'') AS SPR_NO, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'UPRNO' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.SPR_NO ) AS UPRNO, COALESCE(CUST.SPRRATE1_QTY,0) AS SPRRATE1_QTY, COALESCE(CUST.SPRRATE2_QTY,0) AS SPRRATE2_QTY, COALESCE(CUST.SPRRATE3_QTY,0) AS SPRRATE3_QTY, COALESCE(CUST.REBATE1_QTY,0) AS REBATE1_QTY, COALESCE(CUST.REBATE2_QTY,0) AS REBATE2_QTY, COALESCE(CUST.REBATE3_QTY,0) AS REBATE3_QTY, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.UPRFRC_TYPE),'') AS UPRFRC_TYPE, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'FRC' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.UPRFRC_TYPE ) AS FRC, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.CLPROC_FLG),'') AS CLPROC_FLG, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'CLPROC' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.CLPROC_FLG ) AS CLPROC, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.PKGCLM_TYPE),'') AS PKGCLM_TYPE, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'PKGCLM' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.PKGCLM_TYPE ) AS PKGCLM, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.CUSTCL_CODE),'') AS CUSTCL_CODE, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUSTCL.CUST1_NAME),'') AS CUSTCL_NAME, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.CUSTCL1_NAME),'') AS CUSTCL1_NAME, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.CUSTCL2_NAME),'') AS CUSTCL2_NAME, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.CLMCLS_TYPE),'') AS CLMCLS_TYPE, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'CLMCLS' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.CLMCLS_TYPE ) AS CLMCLS, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.SFORM_CODE),'') AS SFORM_CODE, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'FORM_S' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.SFORM_CODE ) AS FORM_S, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.SFORMS_CODE),'') AS SFORMS_CODE, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(SENDNMNAME),'') FROM M_SENDERNM WHERE FORMNMCODE = '3' AND SENDCODE = CUST.SFORMS_CODE ) AS SFORM_S, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.BLPRT_TYPE),'') AS BLPRT_TYPE, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'BLPRT' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.BLPRT_TYPE ) AS BLPRT, COALESCE(CUST.SM1_DATE,0) AS SM1_DATE, COALESCE(CUST.SM2_DATE,0) AS SM2_DATE, COALESCE(CUST.SM3_DATE,0) AS SM3_DATE, COALESCE(CUST.NSM_DATE,0) AS NSM_DATE, COALESCE(CUST.ZSM_DATE,0) AS ZSM_DATE, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.RECCLS1_TYPE),'') AS RECCLS1_TYPE, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'RECCLS' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.RECCLS1_TYPE ) AS RECCLS1, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.RECCLS2_TYPE),'') AS RECCLS2_TYPE , (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'RECCLS' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.RECCLS2_TYPE ) AS RECCLS2, COALESCE(CUST.RECCLST_MNY,0) AS RECCLST_MNY, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.REC1_CODE),'') AS REC1_CODE, COALESCE(CUST.REC1_DATE,0) AS REC1_DATE, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.REC2_CODE),'') AS REC2_CODE, COALESCE(CUST.REC2_DATE,0) AS REC2_DATE, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.REC3_CODE),'') AS REC3_CODE, COALESCE(CUST.REC3_DATE,0) AS REC3_DATE, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.RECMTD_TYPE),'') AS RECMTD_TYPE, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'RECMTD' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.RECMTD_TYPE ) AS RECMTD , CUST.PAYANT_DATE AS PAYANT_DATE, CUST.SMLM_MNY AS SMLM_MNY, CUST.SMLMCND_CODE AS SMLMCND_CODE, CUST.SMLMCND_DATE AS SMLMCND_DATE, CUST.SMLMCLS_TYPE AS SMLMCLS_TYPE , (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'RECCLS' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.SMLMCLS_TYPE ) AS RECCLS3, COALESCE(CUST.ERASE_TYPE,'') AS ERASE_TYPE, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'ERASE' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.ERASE_TYPE ) AS ERASE, COALESCE(CUST.TAX_TYPE,'') AS TAX_TYPE, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'TAX' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.TAX_TYPE ) AS TAX, COALESCE(CUST.TAXCAL_TYPE,'') AS TAXCAL_TYPE, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'TAXCAL' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.TAXCAL_TYPE ) AS TAXCAL, COALESCE(CUST.TAXFRC_TYPE,'') AS TAXFRC_TYPE, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'FRC' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.TAXFRC_TYPE ) AS TAXFRC, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.CRDLMT_FLG),'') AS CRDLMT_FLG, (SELECT COALESCE(RTRIM(NAME_NAME),'') FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'CRDLMT' AND NAME_CODE = CUST.CRDLMT_FLG ) AS CRDLMT_NM, COALESCE(CUST.CRDLMT_MNY,0) AS CRDLMT_MNY, COALESCE(CUST.TRSBL1_MNY,0) AS TRSBL1_MNY, COALESCE(CUST.TRSBL2_MNY,0) AS TRSBL2_MNY, COALESCE(CUST.TRSBLN1_MNY,0) AS TRSBLN1_MNY, COALESCE(CUST.TRSBLN2_MNY,0) AS TRSBLN2_MNY, COALESCE(CUST.TRSBLM_MNY,0) AS TRSBLM_MNY, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.LNKCODE1),'') AS LNKCODE1, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.LNKCODE2),'') AS LNKCODE2, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.LNKCODE3),'') AS LNKCODE3, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.OLD_CODE),'') AS OLD_CODE, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.SEARCHIDX),'') AS SEARCHIDX, COALESCE(RTRIM(CUSTMEMO.MEMORANDUM),'') AS MEMORANDUM, CASE COALESCE(RTRIM(CUST.USE_FLG),'') WHEN '0' THEN ' ' WHEN '1' THEN 'ﾚ' ELSE ' ' END AS USE_FLG ,CUST.BILLCNT_CODE AS BILLCNT_CODE, CUST.BILLCNT_DATE AS BILLCNT_DATE, CUST.BILLCND1_MNY AS BILLCND1_MNY, CUST.BILLCND1_DATE AS BILLCND1_DATE, CUST.BILLCND2_MNY AS BILLCND2_MNY, CUST.BILLCND2_DATE AS BILLCND2_DATE, CUST.BILLCND3_MNY AS BILLCND3_MNY, CUST.BILLCND3_DATE AS BILLCND3_DATE, CUST.BILLCND4_MNY AS BILLCND4_MNY, CUST.BILLCND4_DATE AS BILLCND4_DATE, CUST.BILLCND5_MNY AS BILLCND5_MNY, CUST.BILLCND5_DATE AS BILLCND5_DATE
FROM M_CUST AS CUST LEFT JOIN M_CUSTR AS CUSTR ON CUST.CUST_CODE = CUSTR.CUSTR_CODE LEFT JOIN M_PROD AS PROD ON CUST.PROD_CODE = PROD.PROD_CODE LEFT JOIN M_EMP AS EMP ON CUST.EMP_CODE = EMP.EMP_CODE LEFT JOIN M_SECT AS SECT ON CUST.SECT_CODE = SECT.SECT_CODE LEFT JOIN M_AREA AS AREA ON CUST.AREA_CODE = AREA.AREA_CODE LEFT JOIN M_IND AS IND ON CUST.IND_CODE = IND.IND_CODE LEFT JOIN M_CUSTTYP AS CUSTTYP1 ON CUST.CUSTTYP1_CODE = CUSTTYP1.CUSTTYP_CODE AND CUSTTYP1.CUSTTYPNM_CODE = '1' LEFT JOIN M_CUSTTYP AS CUSTTYP2 ON CUST.CUSTTYP2_CODE = CUSTTYP2.CUSTTYP_CODE AND CUSTTYP2.CUSTTYPNM_CODE = '2' LEFT JOIN M_CUSTTYP AS CUSTTYP3 ON CUST.CUSTTYP3_CODE = CUSTTYP3.CUSTTYP_CODE AND CUSTTYP3.CUSTTYPNM_CODE = '3' LEFT JOIN M_CUSTR AS SHIP ON CUST.CUSTSP_CODE = SHIP.CUSTR_CODE LEFT JOIN M_CUSTR AS CUSTTT ON CUST.CUSTTT_CODE = CUSTTT.CUSTR_CODE LEFT JOIN M_CUSTR AS CUSTCL ON CUST.CUSTCL_CODE = CUSTCL.CUSTR_CODE LEFT JOIN M_CUSTMEMO AS CUSTMEMO ON CUST.CUST_CODE = CUSTMEMO.CUST_CODE $WHERE
System.M_CUST016: SELECT RTRIM(COALESCE(CUSTR.CUST_RNAME,'')) AS CUST_NAME FROM M_CUST AS CUST LEFT JOIN M_CUSTR AS CUSTR ON CUST.CUST_CODE = CUSTR.CUSTR_CODE WHERE CUST.CUST_CODE = ?
System.M_CUST017: SELECT RTRIM(COALESCE(CUST.CUST_CODE,'')) AS CUST_CODE, RTRIM(COALESCE(CUST.CAR_FLG,'0')) AS CAR_FLG, RTRIM(COALESCE(CUST.INOUT_FLG,'0')) AS INOUT_FLG, RTRIM(COALESCE(CUST.CUSTTT_CODE,'')) AS CUSTTT_CODE, RTRIM(COALESCE(CUST.EMP_CODE,'')) AS EMP_CODE, RTRIM(COALESCE(CUST.SECT_CODE,'')) AS SECT_CODE, RTRIM(COALESCE(CUST.AREA_CODE,'')) AS AREA_CODE, COALESCE(CUST.SPRRATE1_QTY,0) AS SPRRATE1_QTY, COALESCE(CUST.SPRRATE2_QTY,0) AS SPRRATE2_QTY, COALESCE(CUST.SPRRATE3_QTY,0) AS SPRRATE3_QTY, COALESCE(CUST.ZSM_DATE,0) AS ZSM_DATE, RTRIM(COALESCE(CUST.OUTEMPNAME,'')) AS OUTEMPNAME, RTRIM(COALESCE(CUST.CUSTCL_CODE,'')) AS CUSTCL_CODE, RTRIM(COALESCE(CUST.UPRAUTO_FLG,'')) AS UPRAUTO_FLG, RTRIM(COALESCE(CUST.SPR_NO,'')) AS SPR_NO, RTRIM(COALESCE(CUST.CRDLMT_FLG,'')) AS CRDLMT_FLG, COALESCE(CUST.CRDLMT_MNY,0) AS CRDLMT_MNY, COALESCE(CUST.TRSBLN1_MNY,0) AS TRSBLN1_MNY, COALESCE(CUST.TRSBLN2_MNY,0) AS TRSBLN2_MNY, RTRIM(COALESCE(CUSTR.ADRESS1,'')) AS ADRESS1, RTRIM(COALESCE(CUSTR.ADRESS2,'')) AS ADRESS2, RTRIM(COALESCE(CUSTR.ADRESS3,'')) AS ADRESS3, RTRIM(COALESCE(CUSTR.CUST1_NAME,'')) AS CUST1_NAME, RTRIM(COALESCE(CUSTR.CUST2_NAME,'')) AS CUST2_NAME, RTRIM(COALESCE(CUSTR.TELNO,'')) AS TELNO, RTRIM(COALESCE(CUSTR.FAXNO,'')) AS FAXNO, COALESCE(CCL.SM1_DATE,0) AS PYSM1, COALESCE(CCL.SM2_DATE,0) AS PYSM2, COALESCE(CCL.SM3_DATE,0) AS PYSM3, COALESCE(CCL.REC1_CODE,0) AS REC1_CODE, COALESCE(CCL.REC1_DATE,0) AS REC1_DATE, COALESCE(CCL.REC2_CODE,0) AS REC2_CODE, COALESCE(CCL.REC2_DATE,0) AS REC2_DATE, COALESCE(CCL.REC3_CODE,0) AS REC3_CODE, COALESCE(CCL.REC3_DATE,0) AS REC3_DATE, RTRIM(COALESCE(CCL.TAX_TYPE,'')) AS TAX_TYPE, RTRIM(COALESCE(CCL.UPRFRC_TYPE,'')) AS UPRFRC_TYPE, RTRIM(COALESCE(CCL.TAXFRC_TYPE,'')) AS TAXFRC_TYPE, RTRIM(COALESCE(CCL.RECCLS1_TYPE,'')) AS RECCLS1_TYPE, RTRIM(COALESCE(CCL.RECCLS2_TYPE,'')) AS RECCLS2_TYPE, RTRIM(COALESCE(CCL.TAXCAL_TYPE,'')) AS TAXCAL_TYPE, RTRIM(COALESCE(EMP.EMP_NAME,'')) AS EMP_NAME, RTRIM(COALESCE(SECT.SECT_NAME,'')) AS SECT_NAME, RTRIM(COALESCE(SECT.SECT1_CODE,'')) AS SECT1_CODE, RTRIM(COALESCE(SECT.SECT2_CODE,'')) AS SECT2_CODE, RTRIM(COALESCE(SECT.SECT3_CODE,'')) AS SECT3_CODE, RTRIM(COALESCE(SECT.SECT4_CODE,'')) AS SECT4_CODE, RTRIM(COALESCE(CCLR.CUST_RNAME,'')) AS CUSTCLNAME, RTRIM(COALESCE(TAXTYPE.NAME_NAME,'')) AS TAX_NAME, RTRIM(COALESCE(TAXCAL.NAME_NAME,'')) AS TAXCAL_NAME, RTRIM(COALESCE(AREA.AREA_NAME,'')) AS AREA_NAME FROM M_CUST AS CUST LEFT JOIN M_CUSTR AS CUSTR ON CUST.CUST_CODE = CUSTR.CUSTR_CODE LEFT JOIN M_CUST AS CCL ON CUST.CUSTCL_CODE = CCL.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN M_CUSTR AS CCLR ON CCL.CUST_CODE = CCLR.CUSTR_CODE LEFT JOIN M_EMP AS EMP ON CUST.EMP_CODE = EMP.EMP_CODE LEFT JOIN M_SECT AS SECT ON CUST.SECT_CODE = SECT.SECT_CODE LEFT JOIN M_AREA AS AREA ON CUST.AREA_CODE = AREA.AREA_CODE $FROM $WHERE
System.M_CUST018: UPDATE M_CUST SET TRSBLN_MNY = ? WHERE CUST_CODE = ?
System.M_CUST019: SELECT M_CUST.CUSTCL_CODE AS CL_CODE ,ISNULL(TR_CUSTD.LCLS_CODE,'') AS LCLS_CODE ,MAX(M_CUST.TAXCAL_TYPE) AS TAXCALX ,MAX(M_CUST.TAXFRC_TYPE) AS TAXFRCX ,M_CUST.ZSM_DATE AS ZSMDATE INTO #CL FROM M_CUST RIGHT JOIN TR_CUSTD ON M_CUST.CUST_CODE = TR_CUSTD.CUSTCL_CODE $WHERE
System.M_CUST020: SELECT RTRIM(COALESCE(M.CUST_CODE,'')) AS CUST_CODE, RTRIM(COALESCE(MC.CUST_RNAME,'')) AS CUST_RNAME, COALESCE(M.SPRRATE1_QTY,0) AS SPRRATE1_QTY, COALESCE(M.SPRRATE2_QTY,0) AS SPRRATE2_QTY, COALESCE(M.SPRRATE3_QTY,0) AS SPRRATE3_QTY FROM M_CUST AS M LEFT JOIN M_CUSTR AS MC ON M.CUST_CODE = MC.CUSTR_CODE
System.M_CUST021: UPDATE M_CUST SET TRSBLN1_MNY = ?, TRSBLN2_MNY = ?, LASTUP_USER = ?, LASTUP_PC = ?, LASTUP_DATE = ?, LASTUP_TIME = ? WHERE CUST_CODE = ?
System.M_CUST023: UPDATE M_CUST SET ZSM_DATE = ?, TRSBL1_MNY = ?, LASTUP_USER = ?, LASTUP_PC = ?, LASTUP_DATE = ?, LASTUP_TIME = ? WHERE CUST_CODE = ?
System.M_CUST024: UPDATE M_CUST SET ZSM_DATE = ?, TRSBL2_MNY = ?, LASTUP_USER = ?, LASTUP_PC = ?, LASTUP_DATE = ?, LASTUP_TIME = ? WHERE CUST_CODE = ?
System.M_CUST500: SELECT M.CUST_CODE , M.MAILNO , M.ADRESS1 , M.ADRESS2 , M.ADRESS3 , M.TELNO , M.FAXNO , M.OUTEMPNAME , M.TTL_CODE , M.MAILADR , M.CAR_FLG , M.INDMN_FLG , M.COST1_TYPE , M.COST2_TYPE , M.COST3_TYPE , M.COST4_TYPE , M.COST5_TYPE , M.PROD_CODE , M.URLADRS , M.INOUT_FLG , M.NFORM_CODE , M.MFORM_CODE , M.OFORM_CODE , M.NFORMS_CODE , M.MFORMS_CODE , M.OFORMS_CODE , M.EMP_CODE , M.SECT_CODE , M.SECT1_CODE , M.SECT2_CODE , M.SECT3_CODE , M.SECT4_CODE , M.AREA_CODE , M.IND_CODE , M.CUSTTYP1_CODE , M.CUSTTYP2_CODE , M.CUSTTYP3_CODE , M.CUSTSP_CODE , M.CUSTTT_CODE , M.CSTORCODE , M.CCUSTCODE , M.CCLSCODE , M.CSLIPTYPE , M.UPRAUTO_FLG , M.SPR_NO , M.SPRRATE1_QTY , M.SPRRATE2_QTY , M.SPRRATE3_QTY , M.REBATE1_QTY , M.REBATE2_QTY , M.REBATE3_QTY , M.UPRFRC_TYPE , M.CLPROC_FLG , M.PKGCLM_TYPE , M.CUSTCL_CODE , M.CUSTCL1_NAME , M.CUSTCL2_NAME , M.CLMCLS_TYPE , M.SFORM_CODE , M.SFORMS_CODE , M.BLPRT_TYPE , M.SM1_DATE , M.SM2_DATE , M.SM3_DATE , M.NSM_DATE , M.ZSM_DATE , M.RECCLS1_TYPE , M.RECCLS2_TYPE , M.RECCLST_MNY , M.REC1_CODE , M.REC1_DATE , M.REC2_CODE , M.REC2_DATE , M.REC3_CODE , M.REC3_DATE , M.RECMTD_TYPE , M.PAYANT_DATE , M.BILLCNT_CODE , M.BILLCNT_DATE , M.BILLCND1_MNY , M.BILLCND1_DATE , M.BILLCND2_MNY , M.BILLCND2_DATE , M.BILLCND3_MNY , M.BILLCND3_DATE , M.BILLCND4_MNY , M.BILLCND4_DATE , M.BILLCND5_MNY , M.BILLCND5_DATE , M.SMLM_MNY , M.SMLMCND_CODE , M.SMLMCND_DATE , M.SMLMCLS_TYPE , M.ERASE_TYPE , M.TAX_TYPE , M.TAXCAL_TYPE , M.TAXFRC_TYPE , M.CRDLMT_FLG , M.CRDLMT_MNY , M.TRSBL1_MNY , M.TRSBL2_MNY , M.TRSBLN1_MNY , M.TRSBLN2_MNY , M.TRSBLM_MNY , M.LNKCODE1 , M.LNKCODE2 , M.LNKCODE3 , M.OLD_CODE , M.SEARCHIDX , M.USE_FLG , M.ADD_USER , M.ADD_PC , M.ADD_DATE , M.ADD_TIME , M.LASTUP_USER , M.LASTUP_PC , M.LASTUP_DATE , M.LASTUP_TIME FROM M_CUST AS M $WHERE
System.M_CUST519: SELECT COALESCE(TD.SECT_CODE,'') AS SECT_CODE, COALESCE(MT.SECT_TNAME,'') AS SECT_TNAME, COALESCE(TD.LCLS_CODE,'') AS LCLS_CODE, COALESCE(ML.LCLS_TNAME,'') AS LCLS_TNAME, TD.MN_DATE, COALESCE(SUM(TD.SELL_MONTH),0) AS SELL_MONTH,--4 COALESCE(SUM(FJ.UPG_MNY),0) + COALESCE(SUM(TD.SELL_MONTH),0) AS SELL_YEAR, --4 COALESCE(SUM(TD.RETURN_MONTH),0) AS RETURN_MONTH,--5 COALESCE(SUM(TD.RETURN_MONTH),0) - COALESCE(SUM(FJ.UHG_MNY),0) AS RETURN_YEAR,--5 COALESCE(SUM(FH_MONTH.REBATE),0) AS REBATE_MONTH, --7 COALESCE(SUM(FH_YEAR.REBATE),0) AS REBATE_YEAR, --7 COALESCE(SUM(TD.GI_MNY),0) AS GI_MNY, --9 COALESCE(SUM(FJ.UAG_MNY),0) + COALESCE(SUM(TD.GI_MNY),0) AS UAG_MNY --9 FROM TR_CUSTH AS TH LEFT JOIN TR_CUSTH_S AS TS ON TH.CUST_NO = TS.CUST_NO AND TH.KSECT_CODE = TS.KSECT_CODE AND TH.HSTNO = TS.HSTNO AND TH.REDBLK = TS.REDBLK AND TH.KEYDATE = TS.KEYDATE LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUM(M.SELL_MONTH) AS SELL_MONTH, SUM(M.RETURN_MONTH) AS RETURN_MONTH, SUM(M.GI_MNY) AS GI_MNY, M.SECT_CODE, M.MN_DATE, M.CUST_NO, M.KSECT_CODE, M.HSTNO, M.REDBLK, M.KEYDATE, M.LCLS_CODE FROM (SELECT RD.TRD_CODE, RD.MN_DATE, SELL_MONTH = CASE RD.TRD_CODE WHEN '140' THEN COALESCE(RD.CT_MNY, 0) WHEN '170' THEN COALESCE(RD.CT_MNY, 0) END, RETURN_MONTH = --5 CASE RD.TRD_CODE WHEN '150' THEN COALESCE(RD.CT_MNY, 0) END, COALESCE(RD.GI_MNY,0) AS GI_MNY, RD.SECT_CODE, RD.CUST_NO, RD.KSECT_CODE, RD.HSTNO, RD.REDBLK, RD.KEYDATE, RD.LCLS_CODE FROM TR_CUSTD AS RD ) M GROUP BY M.SECT_CODE, M.MN_DATE, M.CUST_NO, M.KSECT_CODE, M.HSTNO, M.REDBLK, M.KEYDATE, M.LCLS_CODE $WHERE1 ) AS TD ON TH.CUST_NO = TD.CUST_NO AND TH.KSECT_CODE = TD.KSECT_CODE AND TH.HSTNO = TD.HSTNO AND TH.REDBLK = TD.REDBLK AND TH.KEYDATE = TD.KEYDATE LEFT JOIN M_LCLS ML ON TD.LCLS_CODE = ML.LCLS_CODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT FH.CUSTCL_CODE, COALESCE(SUM(FH.REBATE1_MNY + FH.REBATE2_MNY + FH.REBATE3_MNY),0) AS REBATE FROM (SELECT FH.CUSTCL_CODE, FH.REBATE1_MNY, FH.REBATE2_MNY, FH.REBATE3_MNY FROM F_CLH AS FH $WHERE2 ) FH GROUP BY FH.CUSTCL_CODE) AS FH_YEAR ON TH.CUSTCL_CODE = FH_YEAR.CUSTCL_CODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT FH.CUSTCL_CODE, COALESCE(SUM(FH.REBATE1_MNY + FH.REBATE2_MNY + FH.REBATE3_MNY),0) AS REBATE FROM (SELECT FH.CUSTCL_CODE, FH.REBATE1_MNY, FH.REBATE2_MNY, FH.REBATE3_MNY FROM F_CLH AS FH $WHERE3 ) FH GROUP BY FH.CUSTCL_CODE) AS FH_MONTH ON TH.CUSTCL_CODE = FH_MONTH.CUSTCL_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TJ.CUST_CODE, TJ.MN_DATE AS MN_DATE, SUM(TJ.UPG_MNY) AS UPG_MNY, SUM(TJ.UHG_MNY) AS UHG_MNY, SUM(TJ.UAG_MNY) AS UAG_MNY FROM F_CUSTJ TJ GROUP BY TJ.CUST_CODE, TJ.MN_DATE $WHERE4 ) AS FJ ON TH.CUST_CODE = FJ.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN M_SECT AS MT ON TD.SECT_CODE = MT.SECT_CODE GROUP BY TD.MN_DATE, TD.LCLS_CODE, ML.LCLS_TNAME, TD.SECT_CODE, MT.SECT_TNAME $WHERE5 ORDER BY TD.SECT_CODE, TD.LCLS_CODE
System.M_CUST530: SELECT M.CUST_CODE ,RTRIM(COALESCE(M.CUST1_NAME,'')) AS CUST1_NAME ,RTRIM(COALESCE(M.CUSTR_NAME,'')) AS CUSTR_NAME ,RTRIM(COALESCE(M.CUST_KANA,'')) AS CUST_KANA FROM M_CUST AS M WHERE M.CUST_CODE = ?
System.M_CUST531:
SELECT [CUST_CODE], [CUST1_NAME], [CUST2_NAME], [CUSTR_NAME], [CUSTT_NAME], [CUST_KANA], [DSPORDER_NO], [TPBM_TYPE], [MTPR_TYPE], [ISSUE_TYPE], [INCR_QTY], [MKADD_TYPE], [OODR_TYPE], [CUSTMNY0_TYPE], [CUSTMNY1_TYPE], [CUSTMNY2_TYPE], [WTOUT_TYPE], [RATE0_QTY], [RATE1_QTY], [RATE2_QTY], [MAILNO], [ADRESS1], [ADRESS2], [TELNO], [FAXNO], '' AS [OUTEMPNAME], [TTL_CODE], [TTL_NAME], [CUST1_TYPE], [CUST2_TYPE], [CUST3_TYPE], [CUST4_TYPE], [CUST5_TYPE], [OLD_CODE], [SEARCHIDX], [USE_FLG], [ADD_USER], [ADD_PC], [ADD_DATE], [ADD_TIME], [LASTUP_USER], [LASTUP_PC], [LASTUP_DATE], [LASTUP_TIME], [PDCLS_TYPE] FROM [M_CUST] LEFT JOIN ( SELECT mn.NAME_CODE, mn.NAME_NAME AS TTL_NAME FROM M_NAME mn WHERE mn.NAMECLS_CODE = 'TTL' ) AS TTL ON [M_CUST].TTL_CODE = TTL.NAME_CODE
WHERE USE_FLG = '0' ORDER BY DSPORDER_NO,CUST_CODE
System.M_CUST533: SELECT COUNT(M.CUST_CODE) FROM M_CUST AS M
System.M_CUST535: SELECT C.CUST_CODE FROM M_CUST AS C ORDER BY C.CUST_CODE DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
System.M_CUST536:
INSERT INTO M_CUST ( CUST_CODE, CUST1_NAME, CUST2_NAME, CUSTR_NAME, CUSTT_NAME, CUST_KANA, MAILNO, ADRESS1, ADRESS2, TELNO,
FAXNO, TTL_CODE, CUST1_TYPE, CUST2_TYPE, CUST3_TYPE, CUST4_TYPE, CUST5_TYPE, SEARCHIDX,
USE_FLG, ADD_USER, ADD_PC, ADD_DATE, ADD_TIME, LASTUP_USER, LASTUP_PC, LASTUP_DATE, LASTUP_TIME, [DSPORDER_NO],
[TPBM_TYPE], [MTPR_TYPE], [ISSUE_TYPE], [INCR_QTY], [INWT_QTY], [MKADD_TYPE], [OODR_TYPE], [OLD_CODE], [WTOUT_TYPE],
[RATE0_QTY], [RATE1_QTY], [RATE2_QTY],
[CUSTMNY0_TYPE], [CUSTMNY1_TYPE], [CUSTMNY2_TYPE], [PDCLS_TYPE] ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? ,?, ? )
System.M_CUST537:
UPDATE M_CUST SET CUST1_NAME = ?, CUST2_NAME = ?, CUSTR_NAME = ?, CUSTT_NAME = ?, CUST_KANA = ?, MAILNO = ?, ADRESS1 = ?, ADRESS2 = ?, TELNO = ?, FAXNO = ?, TTL_CODE = ?, CUST1_TYPE = ?, CUST2_TYPE = ?, CUST3_TYPE = ?, CUST4_TYPE = ?, CUST5_TYPE = ?, SEARCHIDX = ?, USE_FLG = ?, LASTUP_USER = ?, LASTUP_PC = ?, LASTUP_DATE = ?, LASTUP_TIME = ?, DSPORDER_NO = ?,
CUSTMNY0_TYPE = ?, CUSTMNY1_TYPE = ?, CUSTMNY2_TYPE = ?,
INCR_QTY = ?, INWT_QTY = ?, ISSUE_TYPE = ?, TPBM_TYPE = ?, MTPR_TYPE = ?, MKADD_TYPE = ?, OODR_TYPE = ?, OLD_CODE = ?, WTOUT_TYPE = ?,
RATE0_QTY = ?, RATE1_QTY = ?, RATE2_QTY = ?, PDCLS_TYPE = ? WHERE CUST_CODE = ?
System.M_CUST538:
SELECT C.[CUST_CODE] AS '得意先コード' ,C.[CUST1_NAME] AS '得意先名１' ,C.[CUSTR_NAME] AS '得意先名（略称）' ,C.[CUSTT_NAME] AS '得意先名（短縮）' ,C.[CUST_KANA] AS '得意先名（カナ）' ,C.[DSPORDER_NO] AS '表示順'
,C.[CUSTMNY0_TYPE] AS '販売単価(パイプ)' ,N_CUSTMNY_0.NAME_NAME AS '販売単価(パイプ)名' ,C.[CUSTMNY1_TYPE] AS '販売単価(継手)' ,N_CUSTMNY_1.NAME_NAME AS '販売単価(継手)名' ,C.[CUSTMNY2_TYPE] AS '販売単価(特殊)' ,N_CUSTMNY_2.NAME_NAME AS '販売単価(特殊)名'
,C.[RATE0_QTY] AS '掛率(%)パイプ' ,C.[RATE1_QTY] AS '掛率(%)継手' ,C.[RATE2_QTY] AS '掛率(%)特殊' , C.[PDCLS_TYPE] AS '径別分類区分' , N_PDCLS.[NAME_NAME] AS '径別分類区分名'
,C.[TPBM_TYPE] AS '図面上下区分' ,N_TPBM.[NAME_NAME] AS '図面上下区分名' ,C.[MTPR_TYPE] AS '材料支給区分' ,N_MTPR.[NAME_NAME] AS '材料支給区分名' ,C.[ISSUE_TYPE] AS '注文書発行区分' ,N_ISSUE.[NAME_NAME] AS '注文書発行区分名' ,C.[INCR_QTY] AS '増量率請求(%)' ,C.[INWT_QTY] AS '増量率重量(%)'
,C.[MKADD_TYPE] AS 'マーキン加算区分' ,N_MKADD.[NAME_NAME] AS 'マーキン加算区分名' ,C.[OODR_TYPE] AS '一本発注区分' ,N_OODR.[NAME_NAME] AS '一本発注区分名' ,C.[MAILNO] AS '郵便番号' ,C.[ADRESS1] AS '住所１' ,C.[ADRESS2] AS '住所２' ,C.[TELNO] AS '電話番号' ,C.[FAXNO] AS 'FAX番号' ,C.[TTL_CODE] AS '敬称コード' ,N_TTL.[NAME_NAME] AS '敬称コード名' ,C.[CUST1_TYPE] AS '得意先区分１' ,C.[CUST2_TYPE] AS '得意先区分２' ,C.[CUST3_TYPE] AS '得意先区分３' ,C.[CUST4_TYPE] AS '得意先区分４' ,C.[CUST5_TYPE] AS '得意先区分５' ,C.[OLD_CODE] AS '旧システムコード' ,C.[SEARCHIDX] AS '検索INDEX' ,C.[USE_FLG] AS '使用可否フラグ' ,N_USEFLG.[NAME_NAME] AS '使用可否フラグ名' ,C.[ADD_USER] AS '登録ユーザー名' ,C.[ADD_PC] AS '登録PC名' ,C.[ADD_DATE] AS '登録日付' ,C.[ADD_TIME] AS '登録時刻' ,C.[LASTUP_USER] AS '最終更新ユーザー名' ,C.[LASTUP_PC] AS '最終更新PC名' ,C.[LASTUP_DATE] AS '最終更新日付' ,C.[LASTUP_TIME] AS '最終更新時刻' ,C.[WTOUT_TYPE] AS '重量表出力区分' ,N_WTOUT.[NAME_NAME] AS '重量表出力区分名' FROM [M_CUST] C LEFT JOIN [M_NAME] N_CUSTMNY_0 ON N_CUSTMNY_0.[NAMECLS_CODE] = 'CUSTMNY' AND C.[CUSTMNY0_TYPE] = N_CUSTMNY_0.[NAME_CODE] LEFT JOIN [M_NAME] N_CUSTMNY_1 ON N_CUSTMNY_1.[NAMECLS_CODE] = 'CUSTMNY' AND C.[CUSTMNY1_TYPE] = N_CUSTMNY_1.[NAME_CODE] LEFT JOIN [M_NAME] N_CUSTMNY_2 ON N_CUSTMNY_2.[NAMECLS_CODE] = 'CUSTMNY' AND C.[CUSTMNY2_TYPE] = N_CUSTMNY_2.[NAME_CODE] LEFT JOIN [M_NAME] N_USEFLG ON N_USEFLG.[NAMECLS_CODE] = 'USEFLG' AND C.[USE_FLG] = N_USEFLG.[NAME_CODE] LEFT JOIN [M_NAME] N_TPBM ON N_TPBM.[NAMECLS_CODE] = 'TPBM' AND C.[TPBM_TYPE] = N_TPBM.[NAME_CODE] LEFT JOIN [M_NAME] N_MTPR ON N_MTPR.[NAMECLS_CODE] = 'MTPR' AND C.[MTPR_TYPE] = N_MTPR.[NAME_CODE] LEFT JOIN [M_NAME] N_ISSUE ON N_ISSUE.[NAMECLS_CODE] = 'ISSUE' AND C.[ISSUE_TYPE] = N_ISSUE.[NAME_CODE] LEFT JOIN [M_NAME] N_MKADD ON N_MKADD.[NAMECLS_CODE] = 'MKADD' AND C.[MKADD_TYPE] = N_MKADD.[NAME_CODE] LEFT JOIN [M_NAME] N_OODR ON N_OODR.[NAMECLS_CODE] = 'OODR' AND C.[OODR_TYPE] = N_OODR.[NAME_CODE] LEFT JOIN [M_NAME] N_TTL ON N_TTL.[NAMECLS_CODE] = 'TTL' AND C.[TTL_CODE] = N_TTL.[NAME_CODE] LEFT JOIN [M_NAME] N_PDCLS ON N_PDCLS.[NAMECLS_CODE] = 'PDCLS' AND C.[PDCLS_TYPE] = N_PDCLS.[NAME_CODE] LEFT JOIN [M_NAME] N_WTOUT ON N_WTOUT.[NAMECLS_CODE] = 'WTOUT' AND C.[WTOUT_TYPE] = N_WTOUT.[NAME_CODE]
System.M_CUST539: SELECT COUNT(M.PROD_CODE) AS [COUNT] FROM M_PROD M WHERE RTRIM(M.CUST_CODE) LIKE ? OR RTRIM(M.DLVR_CODE) LIKE ?
System.M_CUST_COMBO001: SELECT C.[CUST_CODE] ,C.[CUST1_NAME] ,C.[CUSTR_NAME] ,C.[CUSTT_NAME] FROM [M_CUST] C WHERE C.[USE_FLG] = '0' ORDER BY C.DSPORDER_NO,C.[CUST_CODE]
System.M_CUST540: SELECT N.NAME_NAME AS 'CUST_TTL_NAME' FROM M_CUST C JOIN M_NAME N ON N.NAMECLS_CODE = 'TTL' AND C.TTL_CODE = N.NAME_CODE WHERE C.CUST_CODE = ?
System.M_CUST541: SELECT C.PDCLS_TYPE AS PDCLS_TYPE FROM M_CUST C WHERE C.CUST_CODE = ?
System.M_CUST542: SELECT [CUST_CODE], [CUST1_NAME], [CUST2_NAME], [CUSTR_NAME], [CUSTT_NAME], [CUST_KANA], [DSPORDER_NO], [TPBM_TYPE], [MTPR_TYPE], [ISSUE_TYPE], [INCR_QTY], [INWT_QTY], [MKADD_TYPE], [OODR_TYPE], [CUSTMNY0_TYPE], [CUSTMNY1_TYPE], [CUSTMNY2_TYPE], [WTOUT_TYPE], [RATE0_QTY], [RATE1_QTY], [RATE2_QTY], [MAILNO], [ADRESS1], [ADRESS2], [TELNO], [FAXNO], '' AS [OUTEMPNAME], [TTL_CODE], [TTL_NAME], [CUST1_TYPE], [CUST2_TYPE], [CUST3_TYPE], [CUST4_TYPE], [CUST5_TYPE], [OLD_CODE], [SEARCHIDX], [USE_FLG], [ADD_USER], [ADD_PC], [ADD_DATE], [ADD_TIME], [LASTUP_USER], [LASTUP_PC], [LASTUP_DATE], [LASTUP_TIME], [PDCLS_TYPE] FROM [M_CUST] LEFT JOIN ( SELECT mn.NAME_CODE, mn.NAME_NAME AS TTL_NAME FROM M_NAME mn WHERE mn.NAMECLS_CODE = 'TTL' ) AS TTL ON [M_CUST].TTL_CODE = TTL.NAME_CODE
